synthesis_conditions.temperature: 193(2) K for X-ray structure determinations; Room temperature for IR and ESR spectra; 30 °C to 950 °C at 5 °C/min under a flow of air (40 mL/min) for TGA

solvents.name: methanol
solvents.amount: 40ml for initial solution; used for washing

equipment: Autosorb-1 Surface Area and Pore Size Analyzer
Bruker SMART APEX CCD Single Crystal Diffraction System
synthesis_conditions.time: Stirred for 10 minutes; Crystals grown over 3 days
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The precipitate began to form immediately after mixing the solutions. Single crystals suitable for X-ray analysis were grown by layering the methanolic solution of [Mn(salen)]ClO4⋅2H2O and [Et4N]3[Fe(CN)6] over the aqueous solution of (Me4N)4[Nb6Cl12(CN)6]⋅2MeOH.
